divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in our van driving home. A passenger noticed it at first. We slowed downto relize the disk figure was not an airplane because it was hovering, still,and its shape was round. From the angle we looked at it we knew it was a diskshape, then as we drove slowly under it, the direction at which the lights werepointing changed and its figure turned into to a plane, but it didnt completelylook like a plane because its wings were more triangular and the body wasdifferent. When we first saw it we thought it was a plane.We were all excitedand wanted to stop and look, then we lossed sight of it when it moved slowlyforward and then disapeared in a flash.
Summary: saw disk with a pointed top
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around August 16th 2004
